WorkItem.Description:
Hi,


I find some bugs but i'm not sure that bug or not.
I tried to format value with date format.

Here is my Code

```
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle(chr(65+12).$rowC)->getAlignment()->setHorizontal(PHPExcel_Style_Alignment::HORIZONTAL_LEFT);
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle(chr(65+12).$rowC)->getNumberFormat()->setFormatCode('dd-mmm-yyyy');
$objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValueByColumnAndRow(12, $rowC, PHPExcel_Shared_Date::stringToExcel($row->permanent_date));
```

Something weird in my excel results. A half of value have been formatted, but some value not formatted well. As I see the excel file, the result print excel timestamp format.

It's only happen if I use the latest version of PHPExcel (1.7.9).
But when I refer back to 1.7.8, it's work perfectly.

I attach the result file.. Take a look at "Tgl. Lahir" column, "Tgl. Masuk Jamsostek" column, and the others columns that have date format.

__Update :
It's happen when I open the doc with excel 2013, work perfect with excel 2010__
